pergunta: Context mentions: Algonquins and Hurons with French
resposta: Iroquois with British. Naval control was crucial. Pitt's role. The fall of Montreal in 1760. French commanders like James Wolfe, George Washington, Louis-Joseph de Montcalm, etc. The Battle of the Plains of Abraham (Quebec's capture). The Siege of Louisbourg in 1758. The Battle of Carillon (also known as Ticonderoga). Pontiac as an Ottawa leader.
